name: PuppetShow: Bloody Rosie Collector's Edition
description:
PuppetShow: Bloody Rosie Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by ERS Game Studios. It came out on 16-11-2016. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play PuppetShow: Bloody Rosie Collector's Edition on PC.
